List of top international rankings by country

This list of top international rankings by country includes global-scale lists of countries with rankings (this list only contains sovereign states), sorted by country that is placed top or bottom in the respective ranking.

List[edit]

In order to limit the scope of the list and distinguish notable statistical indicators from trivial ones, entries in this list should contain a link to one of the following:

  • A list of countries with the corresponding ranking
  • An article which contains the corresponding ranking in one of its sections
  • A global-scale map reflecting the corresponding ranking
